text: Mohamed Ghozzi (Arabic:محمد الغزي) (24 February 1949 – 18 January 2024) was a Tunisian poet and critic. Ghozzi died on 18 January 2024, at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Tunisian writers Category:African poets Category:Literary critics
title: Mohamed Ghozzi
